titleStmt.title: The mock-elogie on the funeral of Mr. Caryl; gloriously solemnized, February 25th. 1672/3. by an unparallell'd concourse and attendance of all sorts and sects of people.
titleStmt.author: E. H.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Bless me! what's here? a motley-throng;".
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
